original_text: Then you ought to have invested my money with the bankers, and at my coming I should have received what was my own with interest.
korean_text: 그러면 네가 마땅히 내 돈을 취리하는 자들에게나 맡겼다가 내가 돌아와서 내 원금과 이자를 받게 하였을 것이니라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then you ought to have invested my money with the bankers
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 내 돈을 은행에 맡겼어야 했다.

sentences.original_text: I should have received what was my own
